definition[0]: again, after happening several times before
example[0]: I looked at myself in the mirror once more.
example[1]: Once again sheâ€™s refusing to help.
definition[1]: used to say that a situation changes back to its previous state
example[2]: The crowds had all gone home and the street was quiet once more.
definition[2]: used before you repeat something that you said before
example[3]: Once again, it must be stressed that the pilot was not to blame.
